docs.lead_paragraph: The American fashion trend for the fall and winter is now being shaped, as Seventh Avenue designers unveil their collections to the press and to store buyers. The showings presently under way are the American equivalent of the Paris fashion openings in July. The new clothes will be in stores by late summer.

headline.main: American Collections; Hum of Approval Greets Fall Styles
